channel.title: Project fatality help!
channel.description:
So I downloaded the project fatality client and when I click run it says this!!
The System cannot find specified. Operating System: Windows 7 6.1 Project Fatality - Client. Java.io.FileFoundException: C\projectfalalityv6\Dada\MapCFG.dat <The system cannot find the path specified> at java.FileInputStream.open<Native Method> at java.FileInputStream.<init><unknown source> at java.FileInputStream.<init><unknown source> at client.setNewMaps<client.java:7505> at RSApplet.run<client.java:5240> at java.lang.Thread.run<Unknown source>
It also says error connecting to server. :(

item.title: Project fatality help!
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

So I downloaded the project fatality client and when I click run it says this!!

The System cannot find specified.
Operating System: Windows 7 6.1
Project Fatality - Client.
Java.io.FileFoundException: C\projectfalalityv6\Dada\MapCFG.dat
at java.FileInputStream.open
at java.FileInputStream.
at java.FileInputStream.
at client.setNewMapsclient.java:7505
at RSApplet.runclient.java:5240
at java.lang.Thread.run

It also says error connecting to server.

Read full topic
